name: LET IT RAIN
description:
Insights from the Dreaming Pool - Release. 
The pressure builds before the rain, the tension can be felt in the head. All that is wanted is the sweet release as the water falls. Have you ever heard the sound of the rain on a tin roof while you’re safe and warm inside? The beauty of the sound penetrates you and relaxes you to your core. There is a release in your body and your mind as the sound transports you and expands you into the moment. This release by its very nature can sow seeds of peace and calm in your being.

The breaking of the waters just happens, the dam breaks, everything is released and the time has come. When the rain finally falls everyone and everything rejoices. 

Everything is shifting and moving to a new phase. You know because you can feel the release within you. Release comes after acceptance of where you are. The Universe is answering with releasing what’s on the inside out into the world.  


The Dreaming Pool Oracle is a collaboration between artists Maia Mellier 🕸 🕷 (@maiamellier) & AEVIN (@aevin_io)
